entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
